sentences.english: Mountain half marathon in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 山一半在杯的马拉松隆起，不列颠哥伦比亚，加拿大。

sentences.english: We pitched on the other side of the hill.
Behind the tip of the A, behind the plateau of Mont -Saint-Jean, is the forest of Soignes.
sentences.chinese: 在A字的尖顶和圣约翰山高地后面的，是索瓦宁森林。

sentences.english: There seems to be some majestic primeval connection between a man and a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在男人与山之间似乎存在某种宏大的原始联系。

sentences.english: Although had been in Shengzhou for close to ten years now, I had never been to Beizhang Mountain and passing there.
sentences.chinese: 到剡县也有将近十年了，可从没去过或路过北璋山。

sentences.english: Give a monkey a tree, give a tiger a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 给猴一棵树，给虎一座山。

sentences.english: Deciding whether to use Hickory Woodlots or Forests is a debate outside the content of this article.
sentences.chinese: 使用山胡桃植林地或者是树林不在本文讨论之列。

sentences.english: Or was it something in the expensive bottled water in Beverly Hills where Oscar organizers are based.
sentences.chinese: 也许是因为贝弗利山昂贵的瓶装水中有些莫名物质。

sentences.english: Since then, I have more admiration for the immortal hill.
sentences.chinese: 以后，我更敬佩仙人山了。

sentences.english: The river is beyond the hill.
He attempted a short cut over a hill to the school. (adj.
sentences.chinese: 他尝试着越过山走近道去学校。
他将在山脚步下停步不前。

sentences.english: Women in ancient times because of the head shaped like a bun, formerly known as bun mountain.
sentences.chinese: 因形如古代妇女头上发髻，旧称髻山。

sentences.english: Summary:High quality cultivation mode of vitis amurensis rupr is divided into six systems.
sentences.chinese: 山葡萄优质丰产栽培模式分六个系统。

sentences.english: One day three woodcutters climbed the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一天三伐木工人攀登山。
